lidarge nawa abhiyogaya - dahas awurudu puhunu kirima jathyanthara puhunu sangamaya lidarge nawa abhiyogaya - sahasraye puhunu kirima juni masa 6, 2016 okthobar 16, 2017 sara len wisin wada lokaya wenas wemin pawathina athara, goliya shrama balakaya thuladi, sama wasarakama pahe janayagen hari adakma pamana salakillata gani. 1990 hi ape yauwana yauwaniyan (saha in paribahirawa) ape wyaparayata ayath aya sandaha apa muhunadena wenaskamwalata muhunadimata siduwiya haki wenaskam apahasuya. 1981 saha 1999 athara upatha labana aya dijital swadeshikayan wana athara, methek janamadhyaya ha kshanikathwaya pilibanda lokayak pamani.

owhu thawath midi waththe wadata noyathi. 19 niyangaya ha shrishmaya nisa hima diya wi yanne ya; papishtaya elesa ma jiwathun atharen paha wa yayi. 20 wadu mawa pawa ohu sihi nokarayi; panuwo ohu ka damathi; binda watunu gasak men dushtakama awasan weyi. 21 mese wanne, ohu daruwan nathi sthriyata pida kota, wandambauwata karunawa nodakwu heyini. 22 dewi thuman siya balayen balawathun iwathata ada damanu atha; owun nangita sitiyath, sthira jiwithayak gana owunta wishwasayak natha. 23 dewi thumano yahathin wisumata owunta rakawaranaya dena seka; hama mohothehi ma ethumange denetha owun yana manga wetha yomu we. 24 mohothakata owhu usas wethi; eheth, wal palati men owhu waha malawi yathi.
